mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (customer_number, name, email, phone_number, status) VALUES (#{customerNumber}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM customers WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM customers WHERE customer_number = #{customerNumber}
SELECT id, customer_number as customerNumber, name, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
